TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DiagnosticsConfigurationHandler extends System.Object implements class System.Configuration.IConfigurationSectionHandler

Docs.summary: Handles the diagnostics section of configuration files.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The DiagnosticsConfigurationHandler method is a section handler that participates in the resolution of configuration settings in the [\<system.diagnostics\>](../Topic/%3Csystem.diagnostics%3E%20Element.md) portion of configuration files.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual object Create (object parent, object configContext, System.Xml.XmlNode section);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object Create(object parent, object configContext, class System.Xml.XmlNode section) cil managed

Docs.param: The object inherited from the parent path
Reserved. Used in ASP.NET to convey the virtual path of the configuration being evaluated.
The root XML node at the section to handle.
Docs.summary: Parses the configuration settings for the [\<system.diagnostics\>](../Topic/%3Csystem.diagnostics%3E%20Element.md) section of configuration files.
Docs.returns: A new configuration object, in the form of a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks The Create method populates a <xref:System.Collections.Hashtable> with the values obtained from the [\<system.diagnostics\>](../Topic/%3Csystem.diagnostics%3E%20Element.md) section of a configuration file and returns the hashtable.

Docs.exception:
Switches could not be found.
-or-
Assert could not be found.
-or-
Trace could not be found.
-or-
Performance counters could not be found.
